data.text:
The location was perfect and magical. We’ve been treated so lovely, great customer and service everything on time i can say a-relaxing and aventuros holiday .The staff was so nice very warm people  and definitely  I highly recommend .

Thank you .
Much appreciate.
data.title: Pleasant stay.

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Anne,

First of all we would like to thank you for your kind interest at MOLiNO.

We are working for providing you a high qualified service with our team.
It was our pleasure to meet and host you.

We hope to see you again.

Best Regards,
MOLiNO
owner_response.author: Alacati MOLiNO Hotel

data.text:
We felt amazing. Everything was as we expected specially the design of the hotel wich was the highest luxury. Also good food and the personal very polite. 
Perfect holiday.
I will recomand it to my friends from Romania.
See you next year♥️
data.title: Perfect

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Blejan B,

Thank you for your stay at MOLiNO and also sharing your nice experience with us.

We are always trying to do our best.
So we are very happy to hear that you had a nice holiday experience in our hotel.

We look forward to welcoming you again.

Best Regards,
MOLiNO
owner_response.author: Alacati MOLiNO Hotel

data.text: This was one of most amazing place I have ever stayed! Wish I could have stayed longer!! The attention to detail from comfort to design was second to none! We were welcomed with exceptional  staff. The hotel new, beautifully designed with high quality. I also has a calming big garden. Perfect location to go walk to Alacati Carsi. Can’t wait to visit next year!
data.title: A wonderful stay in Alacati

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Guest;

Thank you very much for your kind interest in our hotel.
We are trying to do our best to provide you a great experience at Molino.
We are very happy sharing your location experience also... It will help other guests to learn before they arrive.

We look forward to welcoming you again in our hotel.

Best Regards,

MOLiNO
owner_response.author: Alacati MOLiNO Hotel
